title: Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse Weighs in on SEC Lawsuit Outcome: A Triumph for the Crypto Industry
description: In the aftermath of the landmark ruling of the SEC lawsuit against Ripple Labs, Ripple’s CEO Brad Garlinghouse addressed the situation in an interview with Bloomberg TV on July 14, 2023. His insights provide a broader perspective on the effects of the ruling and its implications for the entire cryptocurrency industry. To recap, the lawsuit […]

title: Epic Network Growth: XRP Ledger Hits Major Milestone, VC Spectra Raises $2.4 Million in Presale
description: The world of cryptocurrency is currently experiencing two notable milestones with XRP (XRP) and VC Spectra (SPCT) . XRP has made significant progress, solidifying its position as a dominant force and soaring to reach the top coins on the market. At the same time, VC Spectra, a groundbreaking decentralized hedge fund platform, has garnered tremendous investor confidence, raising an impressive $2.4 ... Read more
